QuestData.Title: On the Crab
QuestData.Description: I just got word that a string of pots we dropped this morning hit it BIG. We're on the crab!$B$BProblem is, the rips are getting stronger and we lost track of some of the pots. They're just sitting out there, filled with spiky blue GOLD!$B$BI need you back out there. Hook one of these buoys up to any of the full traps you find and send it to the surface for us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Attach a Mist-Hopper Buoy to 8 Full Crab Pots on the Shelf of Mazu.
QuestData.CompletionText: You smell that, green?$B$B<Arie takes a big, dramatic whiff of rank, fishy air.>$B$BSmells like money!

Objectives.Objective: Full Crab Pots Sent to Surface
